extendedInfo.description: NOTE: This App requires Root to work. This App allows you to use only one finger to complete pinch to zoom. Works on any pinch to zoom enabled App or window. Say good bye to needing both of your hands for zoom in and zoom out in browser, mail, book reader or whatever !How many times you want to zoom in a web page but you got only one free hand? Let assistive Zoom to help you to zoom to the scale you want easily by just using one finger and one hand only.Assistive Zoom displays a small zoom button at the edge of screen. Just hold on it and move up/down to zoom in/out at precise scale according to the movement you applied. It's that easy ! Pro version also available with function of controlling when to display trigger icon and when to hide trigger icon. [Features]â Works in any pinch to zoom enabled windowâ Floating trigger button can be disabled/enabled at anytimeâ Control scale ration at finest levelâ 3 styles of trigger icon to choose fromâ Customizable triggering and zooming optionsâ Works from Froyo (2.2) to latest Jelly Bean (4.2)FAQ(1) Why it doesn't work?Ans: This App requires root to function properly. If you are greeted by message your device is not rooted upon launching the App first time, then you probably have an unrooted device.(2) Why webpage scales unexpectedly?Ans: Please enable alternative pinch action(3) Why some text on a webpage is automatically selected after scale is finished?Ans: Please disable alternative pinch action

reviews.title: No Note 2 love?
reviews.comment: The concept is sweet, and it would be twice as potent if S pen capabilities were included... am I missing a setting to get the S pen functionality?
reviews.author: Niel H

reviews.title: nearly perfect
reviews.comment: Can you please develop further so I can use s pen of Note 2 to hold to zoom?
reviews.author: Tran Binh Phuong

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I just wish there was a way to disable the menu because it keeps on showing up when zooming. The menu can be accessed anytime anyway via the app drawer. Thanks for this must-have app. Cheers!
reviews.author: Randz C

reviews.title: Works great for me
reviews.comment: Works great I like pinching but sometimes you only have 1 hand that is where this app comes into play
reviews.author: Tristin Leonard

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great app. All phones should come with this. It\'s a no brainer! Simply the right and only way to zoom in my opinion. Use on Note 2.
reviews.author: rick g

reviews.title: I can only imagine that it\'s great...
reviews.comment: I just upgraded to 4.3 before installing and trying this out... seems to not be working for 4.3 on a Nexus 4.
reviews.author: Cameron Gunter

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I just wish I could use it on the Right side of the screen. Am I missing it in the options? Found it, thanks Dev!
reviews.author: Brian Beam

reviews.title: YES, YES, YES
reviews.comment: I\'ve sorely missed this function, especially in the browser, now I have the option globally in all apps! Fantastic effort. A little buggy, but nevertheless fantastic app.
reviews.author: Anders Wilmann

reviews.title: Camera zoom
reviews.comment: Got this in the hope that it could zoom AOSP camera for 1-handed operation in portrait... it does, happy days! A little jerky but my phone is 2 years old, so meh, 5*
reviews.author: Gavin Walker

reviews.title: Really useful!
reviews.comment: This is one of those apps that I didn\'t know I needed until I had it. It is a really great tool.
reviews.author: Ian White
